text: Chris Anderson may refer to: ==Sports== * Chris Anderson (baseball) (born 1992), American baseball player * Chris Anderson (footballer, born 1925) (1925–1986), Scottish footballer * Chris Anderson (footballer, born 1990), English footballer * Chris Anderson (golfer) (born 1970), American professional golfer * Chris Anderson (high jumper) (born 1968), Australian high jumper * Chris Anderson (rugby league) (born 1953), Australian rugby league footballer and coach ==Music== * Chris Anderson (trumpeter), American trumpet player, with Southside Johnny and the Asbury Jukes * Chris Anderson (pianist) (1926–2008), American jazz pianist ==Other== * Chris Anderson (entrepreneur) (born 1957), Pakistan-born British publisher, entrepreneur and head of TED * Chris Anderson (writer) (born 1961), American business writer, former editor-in-chief of Wired Magazine, popularized "The Long Tail" * Chris Anderson (politician), American politician and Democratic Party political activist ==See also== * Chris Andersen (born 1978), American basketball player * Christopher Anderson (disambiguation) * Christopher Andersen (born 1949), American journalist and author
title: Chris Anderson
